channel.title: Pseudo Coder
channel.description: I write code and make the magic happen. Welcome to my world of code and stuff.

item.title: SOLID Principles
item.description: Set of rules each programmer should adhere to in order to make the code more secure, robust and extensible. This is my attempt to make it easier to understand with the help of simple examples.
item.author: pseudocoder.in@gmail.com (Pseudo Coder)
